Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
"\
Keep an eye out for that deal. \ "

(\{ "members", "\\\r\\n\
\Liguria Trading specializes in the trade of rare and valuable goods of the highest quality, nationally and internationally.\\\\r\\n\
\We offer high quality merchant services to all guilds in the city.\\
\\r\\n\
Our prices are most reasonable. We only charge what the town merchants charge.\
\\r\\nSo if a merchant says that a bolt of silk costs 48d, then that is all you will pay for that bolt of silk. No fees or hidden expenses.\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ "visitors", "\\\r\\n\
\\r\\nLiguria Trading provides high quality merchant services to all guilds in the city. \
Our prices are most reasonable. All you pay is the price the merchants of the city charge, no fees or hidden expenses. If the town merchant says a bolt of silk costs 48d, then that is what you will pay purchasing from Liguria trading.\
", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ "members", "\
Guild Council Ideas\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
A page to write down ideas to bring to the guild council, or ideas for the guild council.\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\Guild contracts between guild masters and apprentices.\\\\r\\n\\Idea that has been discussed with Hush, Thais and Bruno so far, will require a private Council meeting to work out the details and discuss it in depth before it's brought up for voting.\\\\r\\n\A detailed proposal for the idea has so far been sent to Master Ignacio, Doctor Hush and Bruno Smith.\\\r\\n\Examples on contracts still needs to be worked out.\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\Protecting shipments between Docks and Market.\\\\r\\n\\Guild Council discussion on Dec 2016\\\\r\\n\In short, the Sailors Guild protect the Docks and handle those. Docktown Mercenary guilds are officially contracted to ensure the safety and protection of goods moving from the Docks to the Market place.\\\r\\n\Right now I'm working towards giving the CV the contract, and have spoken to Druss from the Sailors about such and have their support. Bruno is supportive of Chesh also, and suggested that the CV apply to join the Guild Council.\\\r\\n\\22nd of the 12th month (2016): Chesh has left the city with his children, and he is not expected to return.\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\Rules for who can take apprentices.\\\\r\\n\\Idea that hasn't been discussed yet.\\\\r\\n\This may not be very practical or viable, though the idea would be to essentially limit it to the guilds to be able to train crafters.\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\Overseeing slavery.\\\\r\\n\\The topic was voted for at the Guild Council meeting in Dec 2016.\\\\r\\n\Seeing that slave owners do not know how to handle their slaves, the Guild Council has agreed it is a matter they need to take care of.\\\r\\n\I'm working towards having a guild in Docktown, for instance Vicious Koi as they are already dealing in slaves, to become officially appointed to oversee slaves and owners in the city, and to ensure that owners know their obligations with slaves, and if necessary, punish slaves and take them away from owners who can't control their slaves.\\\r\\n\" \})

(\{ "members", "\
News from the Guild Council\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\Guild Council meeting 12 Dec 2016\\\\r\\n\\Many topics were up for discussion at this meeting, all voting was asked to be sent in advance, so the meeting would focus on the tally and other matters.\\\\r\\n\Council-funded ballroom: Motion denied, four nay, one yea.\
\\r\\nNewtown restaurant: Motion denied, four nay, one yea.\
\\r\\nNewtown coffee house: Motion denied, five nay.\
\\r\\nNewtown guild hall: Motion passed, three yea, two nay.\
\\r\\nNewtown cigar bar: Motion denied, four nay, one yea.\
\\r\\nDaycare: Motion denied, four nay, one yea.\
\\r\\nMoving orphanage to Newtown: Motion denied, three nay, two yea.\
\\r\\nNewtown smithy, carpentry, jewelry and masonry workshops: Motions passed, five yea.\
\\r\\nReorganizing Market Circle traffic: Motion denied, three nay, two yea.\
\\r\\nAddressing slave issues: Motion passed, four yea, one nay.\
\\r\\nConsignment in local shops: Motion passed, four yea, one nay.\
\\r\\nSafe passage of goods from docks to Market Circle: Motion passed, four yea, one postpone.\
\\r\\nNewtown hospital: funding and space will be provided in the cathedral, with services provided to all faithful penitents of the church.\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\Guild Council meeting 26 Nov 2016\\\\r\\n\\Liguria Trading was voted in and became a member of the Council.\\\\r\\n\\Meeting minutes after the Don's approval\.\\\r\\n\" \})

(\{ "members", "\
Metals\\\r\\nBase prices:\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\Steel\: 400d\\\r\\n\
Special steels: 500d\\\r\\n\
Ordinary damascus steel: 500d\\\r\\n\
Special damascus steel: 600d\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
Dyes\\\r\\nDyes are used by the clothiers and they have a strict system on how much various colours are worth. \
\
\\r\\n\Values:\\
\\r\\nGlossy garnet: 300 for a pot, 30 per use\
\\r\\nBlushed rose: 250 for a pot, 25 per use\
" \})
